name: European Climate Research Alliance
membership: In addition to the partners, there are participants and associates. Participants and associates are other researchers or research organisation contributing to the science foci led by the partners.
goal: To bring together, expand and optimise expertise in climate research through a bottom-up approach. The initiative is a platform for joint research planning by sharing existing national research capacities and infrastructures. ECRA acts as a unified voice for climate research in Europe.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
- following-up of European funding initiatives
- following-up on H2020 and FP9 activities
